Constant Field Values

ARG_REMOTE

public static final String ARG_REMOTE
Argument to pass a URI to a remote grobid-service. If this argument is used, no server will be started. If this argument is used the argument "-p" will be ignored.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

FILE_DEFAULT_OUT

public static final String FILE_DEFAULT_OUT
The file name of the standard output file, if no output file is specified.

findPort

public static Integer findPort()
                        throws IOException
Searches for a free unused port number and returns it.The port is in the range of 5000 .. 9999.

Returns:
Throws:
IOException

main

public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws IllegalArgumentException
Starts the the grobid service on http://localhost on given port. if no port is given, the firt free port will be chosen. Synopsis: -p port - starts the the GROBIDService

Parameters:
args -
Throws:
IOException
IllegalArgumentException
